---
title: Inspect Dockerfile
search: true
execute:
  echo: false
  output: asis
---

Viash generates a dockerfile for executables with a Docker backend. You can view the result of this by passing the hidden `---dockerfile` argument to an executable:


```bash
viash run -p docker config.vsh.yaml -- ---dockerfile
```

```bash 
./my_docker_executable ---dockerfile
```

Both of these output the Docker config to the terminal:

```bash
FROM bash:latest

RUN apk add --no-cache curl
```
